en.name: Prototype Amber
en.passiveDescription: Using an Elemental Burst regenerates {{4//4.5//5//5.5//6}} Energy every 2s for 6s. All party members will regenerate {{4//4.5//5//5.5//6%}} HP every 2s for this duration.

zh.name: 试作金珀
zh.passiveDescription: 施放元素爆发后6秒内，每2秒恢复{{4//4.5//5//5.5//6}}点元素能量，队伍中的所有角色每2秒恢复{{4//4.5//5//5.5//6%}}生命值。
